Package com.siqi.taskadmin.model

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siqi.taskadmin.model.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Task-a task can be operated in this application. This class is a basic model of "ToDoly" application. "Todoly" is a simple task administration system. A "Task" have items of title, due date, project name and status.
    Version:
    2018.10.04
    Author:
    Siqi Qian

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus​()
        Returns:
        The status of the task. default status is false(in progress)

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus​(boolean status)
        Set status of this task.
        Parameters:
        status - The status of the task.("true" represents "completed", "false" represents "in progress".

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Override toString method. Return a detailed description of the task in the form: Task title: title Duedate: 20-12-2018 Project name: project Status: completed
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
